description:
Debug Network Faster & Smarter with Proxyman

Proxyman is a high-performance Windows app, which enables developers to capture, inspect, and manipulate HTTP/HTTPS requests/responses with ease.

- Fixed: Requests reappear again after being deleted in Imported File
